attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Low paid workers need to live too. The broader picture of the economy does not
help when faced with paying food, fuel and housing costs. It is very personal when working hard brings in even less
money to pay household expenses. Why hit the lowest paid workers? How much
tax does the prime Minister pay after
his accountants have been at work and will he publish this?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
